definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: Water boiled up beneath the bubble, it seethed and spouted.
sentences.chinese: 球体下的海水沸腾起来，不停搅动，喷涌。

sentences.english: I stirred up the cinders, and fetched a scuttleful myself.
sentences.chinese: 我搅动一下那些余烬，自己去取了一煤斗的煤。

sentences.english: I could feel the stir of it in my hair.
sentences.chinese: 我也感觉到头发被它搅动起来。

sentences.english: The answer to this is in the particle flows roiling around the sides of Planet X.
sentences.chinese: 答案就在于行星X周围搅动着的粒子流。

sentences.english: Avoid using magnetic stirrers as they may damage the matrix.
sentences.chinese: 当他们可能破坏矩阵时，使用磁性的搅动者避免。

sentences.english: The outflows can thrash about, forming curved jets.
sentences.chinese: 向外流出的物质会强力搅动，形成曲状喷流。

sentences.english: Thank Him for stirring the leaders of Ethiopia to take action against this rising threat.
sentences.chinese: 感谢神搅动衣索匹亚的领袖对升高的威胁采取行动。

sentences.english: Add the yoghurt. Stir the mixture with a spoon.
sentences.chinese: 加入酸奶，用调羹匙搅动混合物。

sentences.english: The stirring of renewed secessionist sentiments in Bosnia does the same.
sentences.chinese: 波斯尼亚再度兴起的分裂情绪的搅动亦是如此。

sentences.english: Inside, two young Taliban in clean long white tunics and small white prayer caps recited the Qur'an while a fan in the ceiling stirred the hot air.
sentences.chinese: 天花板上，一个吊扇在搅动着燥热的空气。

sentences.english: Don't stir the milk until it creams.
sentences.chinese: 不要搅动牛奶，直到上面结皮。

sentences.english: You should stir the sugar in your coffee with a spoon.
sentences.chinese: 你应该用汤匙搅动咖啡里的糖。

sentences.english: Put pot back on flame and continue to work it with a wooden spoon.
sentences.chinese: 再把锅放回到火上，用一个木勺持续地搅动。

sentences.english: Winter storms, it turns out, churn the ocean, mixing surface waters with deeper waters.
sentences.chinese: 冬季的风暴搅动大海，将表层海水与深层海水相混合。

sentences.english: Winds can stir dust, however, when storm fronts arise in the region.
sentences.chinese: 风会搅动沙尘，但风暴前端在此区域需是上升流。

definition: to roll/to turn over/to invert/to flip
to turn over/to surge/to churn/to rummage/raging (torrent)
(of a liquid) to boil/(of sentiments etc) to boil over/to flare up/to be impassioned
to flip over/to turn (a page)/to scroll (an electronic document)/to stir (food in a pot etc)/to move things about/to rummage
to stir/to prod/to poke/to move sideways/to strum (on a guitar etc)
to stir/to lift/to set sth in motion
to rotate (about an axis)/to revolve/to turn/to move in a circle/to gyrate
